nodes.text: The Kerkoiden, known also by the slang term Kerk, were a sentient species from the planet Kerkoidia. The Confederacy of Independent Systems General Whorm Loathsom was a Kerkoiden, as was one of the many guards employed by the crime lord Talvee Chawin on the planet Coruscant some time after the Battle of Endor.
The Kerkoiden were based on the initial designs for the Neimoidian species by concept artist Doug Chiang.
